2.0.0.desc: Rewrote bot to use Discord.js, a more robust and feature-rich library.
2.0.0.features: Message deletion, ability to remove basic human rights, voice macros, revamped `help` command

2.1.0.desc: Overhauled backend to allow for easier maintenance and reliability
2.1.0.features: New event and command handlers, image macro database
